title: cidambara nAthA
sahitya:
cidambara nAthA tiruvaruL tA tA nin
 cittam irangAdA tiruvaDiyaladoru tuNaiyilan


anupallavi

  patanjaliyum puliyum paNiyum kuncita padanE sancita mahalAdhA


caraNam    nanRu tIdum ariyEn nondEnE jnAnamilEn unnai nambi vandEnE
mAnrilADum maNiyE sezhundEnE vAtA aru paghait-tIyil nondEnE
